value.0: I have nothing to say to you !

Welcome <FullName>...
We meet again, now the Prime Evils are gone from our world and you saved Prince Albracht there is one thing left to do in the World Of Sanctuary, you remember the Worldstone in Mount Arreat ?
I know that you once been in the Worldstone Chamber to destroy the Worldstone pieces and that Deckard Cain betrayed you and bind the pieces together to release his brothers once again.
We need to destroy the Worldstone <FullName> so we can finaly close the gates between the Heavens and Hell.
This wil not be possible me friend, after Deckard Cain destroyed the stone the chamber was sealed we need to find the magic seal to open the chamber.

I am sorry i don't know, all i know is that Deckard Cain send a messenger away to this part of the world, because Scosglen is not been saved from evil there are still portals to Hell in this part of the world that are not sealed. We need to get the messenger before he disappear in one of the Hellgates.
I don't know you need to destroy all the gates and look arround to see if you can find the messenger somewhere nearby one of the portals, we need that seal to open the Worldstone Chamber.

Go down into the Barrows and find the Ancient Hall Of Heroes, be carefull the barrows are filled with evil monsters. In the Ancient Hall of Heroes you wil find the first Hellgate that you need to close. When you have closed the gate come back to me.
Hello <FullName>, i see that you have closed the gate in the Barrows, did you killed the messenger and got the magic seal to open the Worldstone Chamber ?
Mmmm... that is not good news me friend .. not good news at all... I suppose the messenger is wandering deeper into the World of Sanctuary. We need to find him before he enters one of the Hellgates.

Mmmm let me think... there where Nine Gates in the World of Sanctuary, four you closed before, but i am afraid Hadriel opend the gates again. You gave them to him to use them to defeat Azmodam, Hadriel must have used them to open the Hellgates again. You need to close the first four Hellgates again me friend. I believe the secret magic seal to open the Worldstone Chamber has something to do with that Nine Seals of the Hellgates.

Close the first Hellgate in the High Field Grass.
Close the second Hellgate in the Ruines Of Alterac.
Close the thirth Hellgate in the Caverns Of Time.
Colse the fourth Hellgate in Terror Run.

Come back when you have the lost four Gateseals and the Fifth one from the Barrows.
Hello <FullName>, did you get the first five gateseals ?
I see i will give you the key that gives access to the old city of Túr Dúlra. The city and the rest of Northern Scosglen is sealed off from the rest of the world to keep the evil monsters inside.

You must go into the Barrows again and go to the door that gives access to the lower part of this Encampment. Across the water is a bridge that gives access to the old city of Túr Dúlra. You need to go to the old city of Túr Dúlra and destroy the Hellgate.
Hello <FullName>, did you get the sixth gateseal ?
To get to the next gateseal you need to travel through the Highlands of Scosglen to the northern part of the World of Sanctuary find the Ice blade Hold and close the seventh gate.
Hello <FullName>, did you get the seventh gateseal ?
To get the next gateseal you need to travel through the Vrybenganon's temple and the Halls make your way to the Halls of Horror and close the eighth gate.
Hello <FullName>, did you get the eighth gateseal ?

To get the last and ninth gateseal you need to find the Ascension. Sometimes somewhere in the World of Sanctuary a portal is opend that gives access to this secret area. The people of Sanctuary do not know where or when the portal is opend but you could ask arround in the city's and encampments to get more information about the ninth gateseal. In the meantime keep your eyes open for the messenger. if you find and closed the ninth gateseal come back to me.
Hello <FullName>, did you get the ninth gateseal ?
Did you get a hold of the messenger ?

mmm i see you have closed all the Hellgates in the World of Sanctuary and did not find the messenger.... i am wondering where he is... is he just wandering the world did he get into one of the hellgates ?  For your last quest destroy the Worldstone in the Worldstone Chamber..
Yes i do ...
Yes that is true ...
Well i go to the Chamber and destroy the Worldsstone !
So, where is this magic seal ?
Where do we look ?
What do i need to do ?
Okay...
No i did not see the messenger in there.
What now !
Okay.
Yes i have !
Thank you
Okay on me way then !
Yes i have !
Yes i have !
Yes i have  !
Yes i have !
No.
